model

Class WorldModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.WorldModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<AnimalEntity>

    public class WorldModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<AnimalEntity>
    World model holds the bucket reference and handles addition and removal of species into and out of the world

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldModel()
      Create the hashed bucket system and assign some stuff in the animal enum because where else would we do that
